license.title: Palimpsest License v0.3
license.quote: “There are moments we cross from what was to what might be. This license is built for that moment.” — Palimpsest Core, Clause 0

language.summary: A symbolic, layered licensing framework for emotionally complex, culturally layered, and synthetic creative works.

features.feature: Credit can be direct, indirect, thematic, or environmental
Protects narrative outputs in synthetic realities
Governed by Dutch law, enforced in Scottish courts
Encourages inclusive formats and ethical design
Requires remixing to preserve or deepen emotional texture

language.summary: Een symbolisch, gelaagd licentiekader voor emotioneel complexe, cultureel gelaagde en synthetische creatieve werken.

features.feature: Erkenning kan direct, indirect, thematisch of omgevingsgericht zijn
